title: Synchronous Virtual Classroom-Based Experiential Mathematics Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A process to enhance mathematical thinking through experiential learning activities requiring real-time collaboration in smartphone-based constrained technological environments, with a focus on cultivating essential data analysis and decision-making skills for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: In synchronous virtual classrooms, learners can apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy through competition-collaboration simulations
In real-time group discussions, learners can analyze and explain three or more real workplace scenarios using mathematical concepts
Learners can perform statistical inference based on data collected via mobile devices and share visual graph representations with peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
